items.sentence: Tom is a lighthouse keeper and leads a lonely life.
Tom is certain that Mary will come to school today.
Everyone\'s waiting to see what\'s going to happen.
Tom said he doesn\'t think that\'s going to happen.
Why didn\'t you tell me Tom couldn\'t speak French?
I suspect Tom and Mary have both agreed to do that.
I suspect that Tom and Mary were afraid to do that.
I think I can probably afford to buy a new trumpet.
How can you talk that way about your oldest friend?
How could Tom have done that without Mary noticing?
How could Tom possibly have known what I was doing?
How did Tom get Mary to help him with his homework?
How did you convince Tom to give you so much money?
Tom definitely had enough time to get the job done.
All I want is a cup of coffee and a piece of toast.
Tom and Mary drifted down the river in their canoe.
Tom didn\'t know anything about what was happening.
Were you playing footsie with each other at dinner?
Tom\'s French is easier to understand than Mary\'s.
Thousands of people became victims of this disease.
Tom and Mary are unlikely to do that by themselves.
I can\'t afford to shop at such an expensive store.
I can\'t believe that Tom made a mistake like that.
Tom said he thought Mary wouldn\'t want to do that.
Tom said he wanted to show what he\'d made to Mary.
Did you know Tom is pretty good at speaking French?
Tom wants you to call him back as soon as possible.
Tom was absolutely miserable when his dog ran away.
Tom was aware that the police were looking for him.
Tom never did anything Mary had to forgive him for.
Tom pretended not to hear Mary and John whispering.
Tom said that he had never formally studied French.
I don\'t want to be a disappointment to my parents.
How long do you think this pair of shoes will last?
Ever since Tom died, things haven\'t been the same.
How are people going to know what needs to be done?
How are we going to get this piano up those stairs?
Tom is the only one here who doesn\'t speak French.
Tom is the only one who knows Mary\'s phone number.
Tom is the only one who knows why Mary isn\'t here.
My wife did not attend the party and neither did I.
Please think it over and let me know your decision.
When did you realize that Tom didn\'t like it here?
Tom and Mary said they had to work some things out.
Tom ate a piece of toast and drank a cup of coffee.
I don\'t even know what\'s happening to me anymore.
I thought Tom was the best singer on stage tonight.
I thought Tom would want to try some Japanese food.
I thought for a second that Tom was going to faint.
I thought we could go out and get something to eat.
